description: Maria Branyas recovers after weeks in isolation, having experienced only mild symptoms.
title: Maria Branyas: 'Oldest woman in Spain' beats coronavirus at 113
title_page: Maria Branyas: 'Oldest woman in Spain' beats coronavirus at 113 - BBC News
maintext: Born in Mexico in 1907, she moved north to San Francisco two years later and arrived in the Catalan province of Girona during World War One with her Spanish journalist father. She raised three children - one of whom recently turned 86 - has 11 grandchildren - the oldest of whom is 60 - and 13 great-grandchildren.
